verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To know Him, to know Him, Is the cry of my heart. The Spirit reveals Him to me. To hear what He’s saying Brings life to my soul. To know Him, to know Him alone.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To Know You, to know You, Is the cry of my heart. Jesus, Your face now I see. To hear what You’re saying Brings life to my soul. To know You, to know You alone.{/lang-eng}
